citation.excerpt: If you use this code or their results in your research, you should cite:

description.excerpt: This repository contains a Tensorflow implementation of Salesforce Research's Quasi-Recurrent Neural Networks paper. It supports batch-major or time-major inputs in single or double precision.
The QRNN provides similar accuracy to the LSTM but can be betwen 2 and 17 times faster than the highly optimized NVIDIA cuDNN LSTM implementation depending on the use case.
The original PyTorch implementation of the QRNN can be found here.

installation.excerpt:
To install, simply run: 
pip3 install qrnn

requirement.excerpt:
- Tensorflow 1.4 (`pip install tensorflow` or `pip install tensorflow-gpu`)
- GCC
- CUDA (optional, needed for GPU support)
